grantee_name: Center Against Rape and Domestic Violence (CARDV)
grant_purpose: To support its emergency shelter program
To fund the residency of three homeless teens for one year
To support its Therapeutic Education program in Marion and Polk Counties
To partially cover the costs of funding a specially trained pediatrician
To purchase equipment, and for operational costs
To support its New Start program
To provide scholarships for its ACES program
For the continuation and enhancement of its academic achievement and community school enrichment programs in Spray and Mitchell
